item.title: Media Wrap March 27 (update April 2)
Media Wrap March
item.description: Media Wrap-up March (headlines) A year of severed trade between North Korean and China… we need to prepare for a change in North Korea’s foreign relations “북·중 교역 단절 1년…北 대외관계 전환 대비해야” http://www.newspim.com/news/view/20210316001149 March 17, 2021. Even Xi Jinping is afraid: Furious Japan and America fire off a ‘terrible blow’ towards the Senkaku Island-coveting China 習近平も恐怖する…尖閣を狙う中国に、マジギレの日米が放つ「凄まじい一撃」 https://gendai.ismedia.jp/articles/-/81341 March 19, 2021 Wang Yi on the South China Sea：rule out interference, promote consultation on ‘standards for behaviour in the South China sea’

item.title: A Nuclear Umbrella won't make North Korea Abandon Nuclear Weapons
item.description: A Nuclear Umbrella won’t make North Korea Abandon Nuclear Weapons Updated: Jul 19, 2019 中国向朝鲜提供核保护劝其弃核不现实 Global Times (Huanqiu) Nov 13, 2013 http://mil.huanqiu.com/paper/2013-11/4558761.html?agt=15422 Full title: It is not Realistic for China to Provide North Korea with a Nuclear Umbrella in order to Persuade it to Abandon Nuclear Weapons Zhang Liangui 张琏瑰 - Institute for International Strategic Studies of the Central Party School of the Communist Party of China 中共中央黨校國際戰略研究所

item.title: From the Heisei to the Reiwa era - the Self Defence Force and National Security of a Changing Japan
item.description: From the Heisei to the Reiwa era - the Self Defence Force and National Security of a Changing Japan Updated: Jul 19, 2019 平成から令和へ。変わる日本の自衛隊と安全保障 Asahi May 22, 2019 https://webronza.asahi.com/politics/articles/2019052200004.html Gen Nakatani, Former Minister of Defence, on the transformation of the JSDF (Japanese Self Defence Force) and national security*, and the current state of Japan. Gen Nakatani - Liberal Democratic Party (LDP) Member of the House of Representatives, Former Minister of Defence
